title: Navigate to /dashboard after sign-in from selected CTA button

requirements.text: Update the selected button at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[3]/div[2]/div[2]/button[1] so that clicking it triggers the sign-in flow and, after sign-in/registration completes successfully, navigates the user to the dashboard route (/dashboard).

quotes: After someone click this button open dashboard
Open dashboard after complete sign in

acceptanceCriteria: When the user clicks the selected button, the Internet Identity sign-in dialog opens (if not already authenticated).
After sign-in and registration complete successfully, the app navigates to the /dashboard route.
If the user is already signed in and registered, completing the flow results in navigation to /dashboard without requiring an additional manual step.
No other buttons or elements outside the selected XPath have their behavior changed.

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the element identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[3]/div[2]/div[2]/button[1].
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only components).
Keep routing hash-based and ensure navigation resolves to the existing /dashboard route.
nonGoals: Changing authentication providers or adding third-party authentication.
